results.definition: beyond or deviating from the usual or expected
examples: the peculiar aromatic odor of cloves

results.definition: unique or specific to a person or thing or category
examples: a peculiar bond of sympathy between them

results.definition: characteristic of one only; distinctive or special
examples: the peculiar character of the Government of the U.S.
a peculiar hobby of stuffing and mounting bats
a man...feels it a peculiar insult to be taunted with cowardice by a woman
